Lesson 6 - WAP

Expected Work

  1. Installed Photoshop
  2. Installed Photoshop tools
  3. Played around with Photoshop
  4. Watched the Tools Video and at least 1 of the tutorial video series

Agile

  1. Weekly review
    1. Where are we at
    2. Review milestones
    3. Identify problems
  2. What did you since last session
  3. What do you want to achieve today
  4. Any problems?

Lecture

  1. Live photoshop demonstration with layers or further slicing
  2. Go through 1 tutorial
  3. Assign mentors
  4. 50 days left!

Practice

  1. Turn your wireframe into a photoshop mockup
  2. Iterate through the colours
  3. Iterate through positioning
  4. Get the stock photos and icons that are necessary
  5. Draw any custom images using wacom
